snippet: A tax break added billions to the federal government’s current deficit, but the government says it should recoup 80 percent of the shortfall in the future.
abstract: Corporate tax break which aims to stimulate investment adds billions to the federal government’s current deficit, but the government says it should recoup 80 percent of the shortfall in the future as companies that benefit now often face higher taxes later.
